newsitem.title: HONG KONG: HK's Sa Sa says to fix issue price at HK$2.38 each.
newsitem.headline: HK's Sa Sa says to fix issue price at HK$2.38 each.

text.p: Cosmetics products retailer Sa Sa International Holdings Ltd has fixed the issue price of its new share offer at HK$2.38 each at the close of its public offering in Hong Kong on Friday, a company spokesman said.
The spokesman declined to comment on the susbcription response.
Sa Sa offered 328 million new shares, or 25 percent, of its enlarged share capital at an indicative price range of from HK$2.00 to HK$2.38 each.
Of the total, 65.6 million shares were offered to the public in Hong Kong and the balance of 262.40 million shares were earmarked for international placement.
Sa Sa is expected to announce its subscription results on Wednesday. Dealing in the company shares will begin on Friday.

Sa Sa engages in the retail and wholesale of a wide range of cosmetic products including skin-care, make-up, fragrances and hair care products. It operates a chain of 11 retail outlets in Hong Kong and one in Taipei in Taiwan.
